entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Canada Bay area in the afternoon. High minus 7.
